example.text: So far tonight, the disgraced former President has: -Smeared a sexual assault survivor -Doubled down on the Big Lie -Promised to pardon J6 rioters -Called for a default of the US economy

Today, the #DirectorsGuildofAmerica begins its contract negotiations with the major studios. DGA Members deserve to share in the success they fuel. I join them in calling for fair compensation, diversity, creative rights and safer sets. I urge both sides to come to a fair deal.

Today, it was my honor to accept [[user]]' Champion for Children Award. From my Protecting our Kids Act to the Pregnant Workers Fairness Act, I'm proud of my work in Congress to support our nation's children. [[url]]
So far tonight, the disgraced former President has: -Smeared a sexual assault survivor -Doubled down on the Big Lie -Promised to pardon J6 rioters -Called for a default of the US economy

Today, I was proud to join my [[user]] colleagues in calling for the decriminalization of abortion, not just here at home, but around the world. I stand with the people of El Salvador fighting for #JusticeforBeatriz.

I'm proud to deliver this funding which will create good-paying union jobs, improve transit reliability for 200,000 passengers each day according to President Biden , and bring us closer to achieving our climate goals. This past week, I also penned an op-ed as Congress' most-senior Jewish member highlighting my concerns for the US-Israel relationship in light of the Israeli government's proposed anti-democratic judicial amendments, and you can read it in Haaretz here .

I couldn't agree more, [[user]]. Jim Jordan and House Republicans cannot continue to ignore the epidemic of gun violence plaguing our nation. The Judiciary Committee should focus on delivering real solutions like Red Flag laws that save lives- not political stunts. [[url]]
